resources.string: The title and content of the note cannot be empty.
Let\'s calculate the area and perimeter of a rectangle! Enter the following data:

Daily Notes is an Android application that allows users to record their daily activities and also provides a feature to calculate the area and perimeter of flat shapes by entering the appropriate length and width. This application was developed to meet users\' needs in recording daily activities and making it easy to calculate the area and perimeter of flat shapes. Copyright 2024 Muhammad Raihan Fahrifi. All rights reserved.
